response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would greatly benefit someone like yourself. Given its importance and the unique features it offers, I am extending a special offer to you. If you decide to proceed, I would be more than happy to sell it to you for $1,300,000. This price reflects a strategic compromise between the intrinsic value of the product and my desire to ensure a fair transaction. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 1300000}
